description.value:
At 1st level, the Genie lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The Genie Expanded Spells table shows the genie spells that are added to the warlock spell list for you, along with the spells associated in the table with your patron's kind: dao, djinni, efreeti, or marid.

Genie Spells
Spell Level Spells
1st @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.Bi0WutLS7MYTmsCn]{Detect Evil and Good}
2nd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.L9I53ZZT4z6Q7Ypa]{Phantasmal Force}
3rd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.HAAAMdpSrIVKOMIs]{Create Food and Water}
4th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.Bj0TlGKPBuXI2OZW]{Phantasmal Killer}
5th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.K7igBJaVcaIJqerK]{Creation}
9th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.A2QYGTDAIreXXztQ]{Wish}

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
